name: Cravebox
overview:
Cravebox connects brands and consumers via specially prepared, themed boxes delivered to Members’ homes.

Each box shipment is created by expert Curators and is focused around a specific activity, passion, topic or occasion that appeals to the membership, which is currently 200k influential consumers, including 30k bloggers and growing daily. The company uses sophisticated game mechanics and industry-leading social engagement practices to heighten the excitement and fun for its Members, while delivering a high impact, 30-day long social media activation and customized product promotion for participating brands.

To keep the service relevant to the membership and attractive to brands, Cravebox Curators source products from a wide range of categories that appeal to the many facets of its Membership’s interests, including Cooking Baking & Grilling; Hobbies, Pets & Recreation; Health & Wellness; Beauty & Skincare; Kids, Baby & Family; and Home Solutions.
